Package com.trapdoor_escape.src.object_item

Class ObjectItem

java.lang.Object
com.trapdoor_escape.src.object_item.ObjectItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Spirit, Trapdoor
public class ObjectItem extends Object
This is a superclass for all static entities. For this version, there are two subclasses implemented; Spirit and Trapdoor.

ObjectItem is a superclass that allows Player to interact with them to help clear the floor. It only changes their positive when MOVE_LIMIT is reached. Properties are encapsulated. Every ObjectItem consumes one tile of area.

Since:
06 June 2022
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
CARLOS MIGUEL PINEDA

      public ObjectItem()

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      sets to be overriden in the subclasses Trapdoor. It will only be called once in CharacterContorls when the player opens the trapdoor.

    • setColor

      public void setColor()
      sets to be overrided in the subclass Trapdoor.

    • getTileTypeOfObjectItem

      public int getTileTypeOfObjectItem()
      Gives access for getting the tileTypeOfObjectTime.
      Returns:
      tileTypeOfObjectItem - type of tile on top of the instance of ObjectItem.

    • getObjectName

      public String getObjectName()
      Gives access for getting the objectName of the ObjectItem.
      Returns:
      objectName - a string that defines the instance of ObjectItem.

    • getAbscissa

      public int getAbscissa()
      Gives access for getting the abscissa of the instance of ObjectItem.
      Returns:
      the x-component of the ObjectItem's position from the leftmost of the panel in terms of pixels.

    • getOrdinate

      public int getOrdinate()
      Gives access for getting the ordinate of the instance of ObjectItem.
      Returns:
      the y-component of the ObjectItem's position from the topmost of the panel in terms of pixels.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Gives access for getting the visibility of the instance of ObjectItem.
      Returns:
      visible of the ObjectItem.

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Gives access for setting the updated visibility of the instance of ObjectItem.
      Parameters:
      visible - - true or false.

    • randomize

      public void randomize(ObjectItem objectItem, GamePanel gamePanel)
      Sets a random abscissa and ordinate for the tile of instance of ObjectItem that is unique from the past instance of ObjectItem. It makes sure that the random tile is walkable.
      Parameters:
      objectItem - - static entity either a trapdoor or spirit.
      gamePanel - - serves as the communication channel for other classes

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the instance of ObjectItem on a random tile.
      Parameters:
      g2 - - A Graphics2D that allows several methods.
